TopicTitle: [1.0.5] [RELEASE 0.8] Sido's Urania System : 7 new planets and 8 moons !

Articles.Content:
How can I change atmosphere color? I honestly prefer Rhea when it had a green atmosphere.

As we already say on the planetfactory thread, actually you can't change the color atmopshere, also you can't change the ocean color, and it's the same for the color orbit.

Read the FP, i say it's on my plan when the mod will allow it.

As we already say on the planetfactory thread, actually you can't change the color atmopshere, also you can't change the ocean color, and it's the same for the color orbit.

Read the FP, i say it's on my plan when the mod will allow it.

That's weird. Is the colored atmosphere effect I see around the planets in the screenshots a result of the cloud mod then?

The game crash using this mod with KW Rocketry !

I dont have this problem using only Krag's Planet Factory.

(Le jeu plante en ayant ce mod et KW Rocketry, je n'ai pas ce problÃƒÂ¨me en utilisant uniquement Krag's Planet Factory sans Urania. Il y a une solution ?)

PlanetFactory itself is pretty RAM hungry and probably brings you near the memory cap...If you then install KW Rocketry it makes the game hit the memory cap...

But to be sure better post your output.log found in the folder created after the crash..
When I launch the game its showing 2 systems instead of just the Urani system I was expecting. Should I disable the Sentar system?

PlanetFactory itself is pretty RAM hungry and probably brings you near the memory cap...If you then install KW Rocketry it makes the game hit the memory cap...

But to be sure better post your output.log found in the folder created after the crash..

People should use the Boulder Co. texture compressor, would probably save loads of memory!

@OP, Beautiful work and nice video!

i must say thank you for this awesome pack but since your last update (0.5) i can't load FAR with your pack. it work fine with 0.4.

I tried this on a new ksp with only FAR, toolbar and PF+Sido's pack and FAR don't load.

Seem to ne good, maybe you forgot to put all the aurora PNG in your Clouds folder ?

Edited February 2, 2014 by Mecripp2

Sido - I'm not sure if I misinterpreted your first post. But if I use Kethane or any other set of mods that runs over 20 Meg total, then the game won't launch with your full solar system with clouds unless I use aggressive active compression. Basic compression doesn't come close to allowing the game to load. If you're able to run the game with all that everything with just basic compression it must mean I'm doing something wrong. I'd like to use Basic compression so I don't lose mipmaps and so much texture quality.

That's not normal, i'm able to launch almost anything without problems with the Normal captive compression.

Maybe it's your graphics settings which are set to high (especially the texture quality and the render quality level) and so take too ram to be create.

Check your graphics settings, at the creation of the planets, Planetfactory use the different graphics settings to create each bodies, so set them to low and put them to high once your game is launch.

It's the only way i see.

In the KSP/GameData/BoulderCo/clouds/textures have 6 aurora png?

EDIT was, I to do something after, I started KSP to get them to show up ?

https://www.dropbox.com/s/o821f43alzk9hx2/Textures.zip this right ?

Obviously ! How the mod can use the textures if they're not in your installation ?

Maybe it's your graphics settings which are set to high (especially the texture quality and the render quality level) and so take too ram to be create.

I don't understand you, you can't see the aurora on kerbin ?

Drop the six aurora png in your cloud's texture folder (KSP_win\GameData\BoulderCo\Clouds\Textures)

Copy the config text at the bottom of your clouds config files

Restart and enjoy
